question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [go to sun. go to brown building. go towards trees.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is your landmark position relative to the trees?  
choose:  
A. I am to the left of the trees.  
B. I am on the right side of the trees.  
C. I am positioned above the trees at a horizontal distance.  
D. I am located beneath the trees.  
E. I am located in the middle of the trees.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current view shows the trees on the left side of the path, indicating that the agent is on the right side of the trees.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 31), (32, 57)]
Option: B
Reason: From the beginning of the video until around 0:31, the trees are visible on the left side of the path the agent is traveling on. This indicates that the agent is on the right side of the trees. From 0:32 to 0:57, the trees are still visible on the left side. Therefore, the agent is on the right side of the trees. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current view shows the trees on the left side of the path, indicating that the agent is on the right side of the trees.
